name: Ice Age 4
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Russian, Swedish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor  Ready to get wet, wild and wooly?  Team up with your favorite Ice Age characters in a continental competition of glacial proportions!  Battle for treasure with the Herd and the Pirates in their craziest adventure yet!
